speaker: HOSTESS
text: No, thou arrant knave. I would to God that I

speaker: HOSTESS
text: might die, that I might have thee hanged. Thou hast

speaker: HOSTESS
text: drawn my shoulder out of joint.

speaker: BEADLE
text: The Constables have delivered her over to me,

speaker: BEADLE
text: and she shall have whipping cheer enough, I

speaker: BEADLE
text: warrant her. There hath been a man or two lately

speaker: BEADLE
text: killed about her.

speaker: DOLL
text: Nut-hook, nut-hook, you lie! Come on, I’ll tell

speaker: DOLL
text: thee what, thou damned tripe-visaged rascal: an the

speaker: DOLL
text: child I now go with do miscarry, thou wert better

speaker: DOLL
text: thou hadst struck thy mother, thou paper-faced

speaker: DOLL
text: villain.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: O the Lord, that Sir John were come! I would

speaker: HOSTESS
text: make this a bloody day to somebody. But I pray God

speaker: HOSTESS
text: the fruit of her womb might miscarry.

speaker: BEADLE
text: If it do, you shall have a dozen of cushions

speaker: BEADLE
text: again; you have but eleven now. Come, I charge you

speaker: BEADLE
text: both go with me, for the man is dead that you and

speaker: BEADLE
text: Pistol beat amongst you.

speaker: DOLL
text: I’ll tell you what, you thin man in a censer, I will

speaker: DOLL
text: have you as soundly swinged for this, you bluebottle

speaker: DOLL
text: rogue, you filthy famished correctioner. If you be

speaker: DOLL
text: not swinged, I’ll forswear half-kirtles.

speaker: BEADLE
text: Come, come, you she-knight-errant, come.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: O God, that right should thus overcome

speaker: HOSTESS
text: might! Well, of sufferance comes ease.

speaker: DOLL
text: Come, you rogue, come, bring me to a justice.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Ay, come, you starved bloodhound.

speaker: DOLL
text: Goodman Death, Goodman Bones!

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Thou atomy, thou!

speaker: DOLL
text: Come, you thin thing, come, you rascal.

speaker: BEADLE
text: Very well.
